message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $150. I hope you find this fair and look forward to your response.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to offer $120 for the product. I'm willing to pay a premium for a good product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. While we strive to ensure all our customers receive high-quality products, I would like to offer a compromise. For the product, I am now proposing a price of $140. This allows us to maintain our commitment to quality while being more flexible with pricing. I hope this meets your expectations and look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the quality of the product and the value it will bring to me.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further accommodate your budget, I would like to suggest a final offer of $135 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on maintaining a fair transaction while also ensuring that our costs are covered. I hope this proposal works for you, and I look forward to your positive response.
